title: [inSurance Claim] - Follow-up #QmW9eHM
body:
Transaction:
https://etherscan.io/tx/0xc49563383ad6a1e128052148b7b45e9030e2162e995ba86ce657811328258fb0

Insurance is valid. 
Unilayer token has lost 82% of purchase value. The insurance payment will kick in if the token devaluates >95%.

[Message for the policy holder]: Please be prepared to transfer the evaluated tokens once the price will drop lower 95%

[Resolution]:
Rejected, awaiting for the price movement to be eligible for the claim. 
Once the price will go lower 95% of your purchase price, please file a new ticket.
author: 0x4a30e80E9111CDacE350Fa72D011967ba9514b6B
